A Firm Stand for the Right 

     God calls upon His workers, in this age of diseased piety and perverted principle, to reveal a healthy, influential 
                                                                           211
spirituality. My brethren and sisters, this God requires of you. Every jot of your influence is to be used on the side of Christ. You are now to call things by the right name and stand firm in defense of the truth as it is in Jesus.
